mapper.select: SELECT p.song_id, p.playlist_id, s.title, s.singer, s.song_no, s.brand FROM playlist_song p JOIN song s on p.song_id = s.id WHERE p.playlist_id = #{playlistId} AND song_id > #{offset} ORDER BY p.song_id ASC LIMIT #{limit}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM playlist_song WHERE playlist_id = #{playlistId} AND song_id = #{songId}
